data.title: COPASI: About
data.meta_description: COPASI is a software application for simulation and analysis of biochemical networks and their dynamics.
data.text:
COPASI has been generously funded through several sources. We are equally grateful to all of them.

Current funding

National Institutes of Health (USA), grant R24 GM137787 National Resource for Mechanistic Modeling of Cellular Systems (NIGMS)

BMBF Federal Ministry of Education (Germany)

Past Funding

Virginia Bioinformatics Institute (USA)

Klaus Tschira Foundation (Germany)

BBSRC (UK), grant BB/J019259/1

BBSRC and EPSRC through the Manchester Centre for Integrative Systems Biology, grant BB/C008219/1 (UK)

COPASI is derived from Gepasi, which was originally funded by the JNICT (Portugal) and the BBSRC (UK).
